music.playResumeQueueTitle: Queuing up your song & resuming playback!
music.playResumeQueueFooter: If you wanted to only queue a song and not resume playback, use the `!queue` command
music.playNoVoiceChannelTitle: You aren't connected to a voice channel!
music.playNoVoiceChannelDesc: Join any voice channel & try again to start playing music
music.playNoQueryDesc: Enter a song name/url from YouTube to start playing
music.playQueueFinishedDesc: No more songs left to play
music.stopPlayingDesc: Stopped playback & disconnected from the voice channel
music.stopNotPlayingDesc: To start playing something, use the `!play` command
